metadata.title: Purrgatory - A Whimsical Afterlife Visual Novel
metadata.description: Explore the enchanting world of Purrgatory, a visual novel about an afterlife where time stands still. Meet quirky characters, solve mysteries, and enjoy a lovingly hand-drawn experience.
metadata.keywords: Purrgatory, visual novel, afterlife game, point-and-click, whimsical characters, game features

hero.p: Dive into Purrgatory, a visual novel full of whimsy. Explore, befriend charming characters, and discover that 'furever' isn't so bad!

gameFeatures.title: Purrgatory Game Features
features: Available in English, Spanish, and Simplified Chinese
Winner of the 'I Can't Draw' Game Jam

gameplayInstructions.title: How to Play Purrgatory
instructions: Interact with the world using your mouse.
Use the keyboard for quick navigation.
Explore different locations to uncover secrets.
Solve puzzles to progress through the story.
Engage with characters to learn their stories.

questions.question: What platforms is Purrgatory available on?
questions.answer: Purrgatory can be played on HTML5 and Windows platforms.

questions.question: How do I solve the puzzle when the lights go out?
questions.answer: Try visiting Natalie's place to get a candle as a light source.

questions.question: Are there multiple endings to the game?
questions.answer: Yes, Purrgatory features multiple endings based on your choices.

questions.question: What languages is Purrgatory available in?
questions.answer: It is available in English, Spanish, and Simplified Chinese.

questions.question: Is there a soundtrack available for Purrgatory?
questions.answer: Yes, the original soundtrack can be streamed on various platforms.

questions.question: What should I do if the game doesn't start?
questions.answer: Try refreshing the page or using another browser. For better performance, download the Windows version.
